title: Is This a Zombie?, Vol. 1 - manga (Is This a Zombie?, 1)
description: ME, I'M A ZOMBIE AND A "MAGIKEWL GIRL," MAN.Life (or undeath?) isn't easy for Ayumu Aikawa. A seemingly normal high schooler, he is in fact a zombie serving as a bodyguard to an introverted necromancer. But his already complicated existence becomes even more outlandish when he accidentally steals the powers of a "magikewl girl," transforming into one himself. How's a reanimated corpse supposed to keep his head on his shoulders with roommates like these girls around the house?
author: Shinichi Kimura
